title: 國際戰線 佛羅里達州笨蛋

replies.msg:
好多人喺Twitter #FloridaMorons 鬧班佛羅里達州人白痴，因為佢地話武漢肺炎係假，又話要重啟佛羅里達州，我地不如話比佢哋知香港人點自救、共產黨見到佢哋咁無知最開心...

Thousands descending on reopened Florida beaches prompts #FloridaMorons trend on Twitter as coronavirus cases continue to rise in the state

https://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-8234877/Thousands-descending-reopened-Florida-beaches-prompts-FloridaMorons-trend-Twitter.html

反而應該同佢講我地關心佢地
